questions.question: The Great Red Spot is a storm on Mars
questions.actual: It is a giant storm on Jupiter

questions.question: Saturn's rings are made up of countless individual particless
Halley's Comet returns to the inner solar system roughly every 76 years
The International Space Station (ISS) is located in geosynchronous orbit
questions.actual: The ISS is in low Earth orbit, not geosynchronous orbit

questions.question: The concept of a wormhole is purely science fiction and has no basis in theoretical physics
questions.actual: Wormholes are theoretical solutions to Einstein's equations of general relativity

questions.question: Other plantes than Earth have an atmosphere
A light-year is a unit of time
questions.actual: A light-year is a unit of distance, representing the distance that light travels in one year

questions.question: It takes Venus 243 Earth days to rotate on its axis
The speed of light is constant in a vacuum
Pluto is a planet.
questions.actual: Pluto was reclassified as a dwarf planet in 2006
